_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Questions asked by the Buddha [sn51.30:5: What is the basis of psychic power?
What is the development of the bases of psychic power?
What is the practice that leads to the development of the bases of psychic power?
The components of psychic power [sn51.30: Multiplying themselves and becoming one again
